alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Northern Erie; Southern Erie (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 19 at 9:00AM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Erie and Crawford Counties through 1000 AM EDT... At 900 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 11 miles northwest of Erie to 9 miles east of Greenville. Movement was east at 70 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Erie, Meadville, Corry, Edinboro, Titusville, North East, Union City, Cambridge Springs, Waterford, Wattsburg, Canadohta Lake, Riceville, Northwest Harborcreek, Lincolnville, Guys Mills, Harborcreek, Lawrence Park, Wesleyville, Cochranton and Saegertown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
